name: Maroon
description:
A game I've developed with friends for Ludum Dare 41. The theme was "mix up two genres that don't mix together". We tried to mix up a platformer with a cute 'em up, and I'd like to think that we succeded. Hope you have fun!

We are:

🔹Juliano Reis - Programming, Game Design, Level Design

Twitter: twitter.com/djudjubs

🔹Vitória Steckel - Art, Animation, Game Design
